```{css echo=FALSE}
.background {
  display: inline-block;
  height: 30px;
  width: 10vw;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.foreground {
  cursor: pointer;
}
#demo-text {
	padding: 1em 2em 2em 2em;
	position: sticky;
	top: 0;
	z-index: 9999;
	margin-bottom: 1em;
}
#demo-text p { font-size: 1.5em; }

#demo-text {
  transition: all 150ms linear;
}

.darkmode {
  background-color: #333;
  color: #FFF;
}
#toggle-dark-mode {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 32px;
  right: 32px;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  line-height: 32px;
}
#toggle-dark-mode::before {
  display: table-cell;
  vertical-align: middle;
  height: 32px;
  width: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  line-height: normal;
}
.darkmode #toggle-dark-mode {
  background-color: white;
}
#toggle-dark-mode::before {
  content: '\1F319';
}
.darkmode #toggle-dark-mode::before {
  content: '\2600\FE0F';
}
.darkmode .ReactTable {
	background-color: #333;
}
```

<div id="demo-text" class="bg-white black"><h2>Preview</h2><p>Click on a color below<p></div>

::: {.table-responsive} :::

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(glue)
x <- data.frame(
  name = glue('<span class="foreground {colors()}">{colors()}</span>'),
  color = glue('<span class="background bg-{colors()}"></span>'),
  foreground = glue(".{colors()}"),
  background = glue(".bg-{colors()}")
)

reactable::reactable(
  data = x,
  sortable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  pagination = FALSE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    name = reactable::colDef("Name", html = TRUE),
    color = reactable::colDef("Color", html = TRUE),
    foreground = reactable::colDef("Foreground Class"),
    background = reactable::colDef("Background Class")
  ),
  onClick = reactable::JS("
    function(rowInfo, colInfo) {
      if (!['name', 'color'].includes(colInfo.id)) return
      
      const preview = document.getElementById('demo-text')
      preview.querySelector('p').innerText = 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.'
      
      debugger;
      
      const classCell = colInfo.id === 'name' ? 'foreground' : 'background'
      let fg = [...preview.classList].filter(x => !/^bg-/.test(x))
      let bg = [...preview.classList].filter(x => /^bg-/.test(x))
      
      if (classCell == 'foreground') {
        fg = rowInfo.row.foreground.replace('.', '')
      } else {
        bg = rowInfo.row.background.replace('.', '')
      }
      
      preview.classList = fg + ' ' + bg
    }
  ")
)
```

```{js, echo=FALSE}
const toggleDarkMode = document.getElementById('toggle-dark-mode')
toggleDarkMode.addEventListener('click', function() {
  document.body.classList.toggle('darkmode')
})
```
